Load the libraries

```{r}
library(affy)
library(limma)
library(annotate)
library(hgu133plus2.db)
library(biomaRt)
library(tidyverse)
library(GEOquery)
```

```{r}
files = list.files("../data/all", full.names = TRUE)
data = ReadAffy(filenames = files)


rma.data <- rma(data)
rm(data)

expression.matrix <- exprs(rma.data)
rm(rma.data)
expression.matrix <- as_tibble(t(expression.matrix))
write_csv2(expression.matrix,"../matrice.csv")
```
